alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 8:33PM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and light snow expected. Ice accumulations of a trace up to a tenth of an inch. Snow accumulations up to an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Locally hazardous travel conditions are possible. This includes the Interstate 87 corridor. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Road temperatures are below freezing due to the recent antecedent cold conditions. This increases the risk of light rain freezing on roadways, leading to hazardous travel conditions overnight tonight into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary. Remember, it only takes a glaze of ice to create hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
